channel.title: ::givedpoints_player_amount

item.title: ::givedpoints_player_amount
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So Iâ€™m trying to make a command to give someone x amount of donator points.
This is what I got so far:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givedpoints")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split("_"); String playerName = args[1]; String points = args[2]; for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; for (int j = 0; j < amount; j++) { c2.getPA().sendFrame126(site, 12000); } c.sendMessage("Successfully gave "+playerName+ points+"donator points"); } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax use as ::givedpoints_name_amountofpoints to send"); } }
This was modified off my ::url command

Read full topic
